text in study notes: Illumination Models. Description of the factors that influence the color and light intensity at a point.
Local illumination models: only pixel-light interaction, pipeline approach, local information, heuristic approximation, simpler than global. e.g. Phong illumination model & polygonal shading.
Global illumination models: consider all objects in a scene when computing light at a specific point â€“ global information e.g., radiosity and raytracing
Possible question: What is the difference between a local and a global illumination model?
